page.title: 08ARTS AND ENTERTAINMENT 2
page.content: We saw an amusment arcade and some vidio shops as well as a closed down cinema one of four that have closed down in the last twenty years leaving only the Odeon left open. The centre of town now has 3 indoor shopping centres, with most of the big stores in them. Many of the roads have been closed to traffic and paved over. The group noticed some bingo halls where many people go for entertainment, and a new art gallery called the Cleveland gallery which has over 9,000 visitors a year to its 6 exhibitions. Also in the survey area is Ayrsome Park, home of Middlesbrough football club.
